articles.author: Elliot Smilowitz
articles.title: Eurovision 2024: What to know, how to watch and how to vote - The Washington Post
articles.description: The 2024 edition of Europe’s biggest musical party promises bombastic performances, but tension over Israel’s participation may cast a pall on the show.
articles.content:
Break out your most extravagant costume and tighten up your dance moves; its Eurovision time again.
Last year, Loreens power ballad Tattoo narrowly beat Käärijäs electro bop Cha Cha Cha. The win gav… [+142 chars]
